title: YouTube Will Soon Let Creators Make Shorts Using Their AI Likeness
description: But YouTube CEO Neal Mohan says artificial intelligence will be a "tool for expression," not a replacement for human creativity.

title: Forrester picks holes in IT’s AI story, says just 10
description: Despite the brouhaha, most artificial intelligence projects in Indian IT services firms are failing to deliver sustained results. Research firm Forrester says only 10-15% of AI projects make it into long-term production use, though companies claim rapid adoption across their operations.

title: Critics, pollsters warn Canadians are wary of AI, want government to set guardrails
description: The federal government is set to launch its new national artificial intelligence strategy soon — but critics say it hasn’t done enough to listen to Canadians and pollsters are warning that a skeptical public wants the government to put rules in place.

title: Apple reportedly revamping Siri as company's 'first artificial intelligence chatbot' - and it 'will go well beyond the abilities of the current Siri'
description: A new report reveals Apple plans to build a new AI chatbot that will eventually replace Siri.

title: Artificial intelligence in manufacturing rocket parts
description: Artificial Intelligence, or AI, promises many benefits in all domains, and rocketry is no different. The European Space Agency's Future Launchers Preparatory Program (FLPP) is investigating the use of AI to develop better processes and even whole new shapes in materials that could be used on rockets or spacecraft of the future.

title: AI company Eightfold sued for helping companies secretly score job seekers
description: Jan 21 (Reuters) - Eightfold AI, a ‌venture capital-backed artificial intelligence hiring platform used by Microsoft, PayPal and many other Fortune 500 companies, ‌is being sued in California for allegedly compiling reports used to screen job applicants without their ‌knowledge.
